and he

records o=
r results from his experiences, whats wrong with 
this?

now, lets st=
op that aggressive complain and lets talk together 
to reach our goal. maki=
ng contacts with "dimension X",
make the voices listen clear and try to fin=
d a way to see, 
what is the "dimension X". 
=C2=A0
ok? tutto bene?=C2=A0:)=

grettings from bern / switzerland
Salvi

u have many researchers concerning the

 is the interest of
such things near 0%. what a pity. a reason more to conc=
entrate 
our energy in our goal :)
